resources.string: You might have put them on hold or, if you had a transfer that failed, Acorns put your contributions on hold. For instructions on how to start contributing again, log in to your Acorns account.
Please check again in a few minutes.
We\'re having trouble showing you that information at the moment. Please try again in a minute or two.

All you need is $5 and a few minutes to set up an investment account with Acorns. Once you\'ve linked it to PayPal, you can contribute to your investments and monitor them from your PayPal account.

Already have an Acorns account\? Log in
